= Pre-Setup =

FontStream server side work with PHP4+

= Setting up =

== PHP with fontcache files ==

Upload the PHP file `Waterfall demo/PHP/trunk/fontstream.php` and the folder `Waterfall demo/Build/fontcache/` in the same place.

The result:

{{{
fontstream.php
fontcache/
	Cyberbit_regular.fontcache
	kawoszeh_regular.fontcache
	*.fontcache
}}}

=== Add more fonts ===

To create new one, you need SWF with desired font embedded.

Checking available fonts in your SWF. Use `fcgen` from `Font cache generator\Build\` (OSX & WIN32 executable are available)

{{{
fcgen -l gskinner_quick_talk.swf
Embed fonts: 6
  0:    Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro W3 (85 glyphs)
  1:    _sans (0 glyphs)
  2:    Courier (69 glyphs)
  3:    Lucida Grande (1 glyphs)
  4:    #HeadLineA Regular (0 glyphs)
  5:    Futura Condensed Medium (21 glyphs)
}}}

Then export desired font (here the first)

{{{
fcgen -i 0 gskinner_quick_talk.swf
Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro W3_regular.fontcache generated (12302 bytes)
}}}

Finally, simply add created file(s) `*.fontcache` in fontcache folder

=== Change fontcache files location ===

You can modify PHP script to change current `fontcache/` path with an other place

{{{
$filename = 'fontcache/' . $font . '_' . $style . '.fontcache';
if(!file_exists($filename))
	$filename = 'fontcache/Arial Unicode MS_regular.fontcache';
}}}
